oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Public Square in Trenton, Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “View Showing Monument at Public Square, Trenton, Tenn.” Color image with monument, a few people, a couple of horse-and-carriages.

“Mr. C. H. Patton -- 70 West Court -- Memphis, Tenn. -- Dear Olive and Chas, -- Hope you both are -- well and enjoying -- life. All my friends -- and kin people -- have treated me so -- nice and cordial -- and so many have -- asked after Chas. -- You must go up to -- see Papa and the -- home folks while I -- am gone. Lots of -- love for both. -- Mamma”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Trenton, Tennessee; monuments;
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Mc Ree Drug Co., Trenton, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: C. T. Handcolored, Chicago; Collection processed by Angela Price
